mapper.select: SELECT * FROM club WHERE leagueId = #{leagueId} ORDER BY ranking ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE club SET updateDate = NOW(), ranking = #{ranking}, play = #{play}, points = #{points}, win = #{win}, draw = #{draw}, defeat = #{defeat}, goal = #{goal}, goalAgainst = #{goalAgainst} WHERE leagueId = #{leagueId} AND name = #{name}
